feature: Document the CSS design system and component architecture
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the CSS design system currently embedded in index.html (~520 lines). The documentation will cover design tokens (colors, typography, spacing), component styles, layout patterns, and responsive behavior.

phases.name: Foundation Documentation
phases.description: Document the design tokens (CSS variables) including colors, typography, spacing, and other primitives

subtasks.title: Create design system documentation structure
subtasks.description: Set up the documentation file structure with main design-system.md file in docs/ directory
acceptance_criteria: docs/design-system.md created with clear section headers
Table of contents linking to all major sections
subtasks.notes: Created docs/design-system.md with comprehensive structure including table of contents, design philosophy, and section placeholders for all future documentation phases. All acceptance criteria met: clear section headers, TOC linking to major sections, and introduction explaining design philosophy.

subtasks.title: Document color palette and rationale
subtasks.description: Document all color primitives with hex values, usage guidelines, and accessibility notes. Cover blacks, whites, grays, teal accent, and blue variants.
acceptance_criteria: All 14 color variables documented with hex codes
Color usage guidelines (primary, accent, neutral, semantic)
Visual color swatches representation in markdown
subtasks.notes: Documented all 14 color primitives with comprehensive details. Created organized sections for Foundation colors (black/white), Neutral grays (8-step scale with Active vs Reserved status), and Accent colors (teal primary, blue for platforms). Included hex codes, visual unicode swatches, detailed usage guidelines, WCAG 2.1 accessibility contrast ratios for all color combinations, and best practices. Added visual palette reference section. All acceptance criteria met: 14 color variables with hex codes, usage guidelines, visual swatches, and accessibility notes with contrast ratios. Commit: b81b29c

subtasks.title: Document typography system
subtasks.description: Document font families (Oswald, Helvetica Neue, System), font sizes, font weights, and their intended usage
acceptance_criteria: Font stack documentation for heading, body, and system fonts

subtasks.title: Document spacing and layout tokens
subtasks.description: Document the spacing scale, layout dimensions, border radii, and transition values
acceptance_criteria: Layout dimensions documented (content-width, sidebar-width, container-max, gap)
Transition values and when to use each

phases.name: Component Documentation
phases.description: Document all UI components with usage patterns, variants, and code examples

subtasks.title: Document layout components
subtasks.description: Document structural layout components: site-container, site-header, site-nav, site-main, content, sidebar, site-footer
acceptance_criteria: Each layout component documented with purpose

subtasks.title: Document typography components
subtasks.description: Document heading variants (h1, h2.tagline, h2.section-title, h3), paragraph styles, and link styles (default, accent-link)
acceptance_criteria: Each typography variant documented with use cases

subtasks.title: Document interactive components
subtasks.description: Document buttons (btn, btn-primary), form inputs (email-form), and interactive elements (like-btn, share-btn)

subtasks.title: Document content components
subtasks.description: Document widget, profile-image, flight-stats, contact-section, social-links, share-section, signature, and subscriber-count components

phases.name: Responsive & Advanced Patterns
phases.description: Document responsive breakpoints, mobile adaptations, and advanced CSS patterns

subtasks.title: Document responsive breakpoints
subtasks.description: Document the three breakpoint system (768px, 480px, 360px) with what changes at each breakpoint
acceptance_criteria: Variable overrides at each breakpoint listed
Component adaptations at each breakpoint explained

subtasks.title: Document CSS reset and base styles
subtasks.description: Document the CSS reset approach and base body/html styles

subtasks.title: Create component quick reference
subtasks.description: Create a quick reference table/section for rapid lookup of all components and tokens
acceptance_criteria: Quick reference table with all CSS variables

subtasks.title: Add usage examples and best practices
subtasks.description: Add practical code examples showing how to combine components and follow design system patterns
acceptance_criteria: Best practices for extending the system

subtasks.title: Review and finalize documentation
subtasks.description: Review all documentation for accuracy, add cross-references, ensure consistency
acceptance_criteria: All sections reviewed for accuracy against source CSS

final_acceptance: All 14 color tokens documented with usage guidelines
Quick reference section provides fast lookup
